snippet: The chief executives of the two exchange operators plan to meet in New York to discuss their next steps as European antitrust regulators continue to signal opposition to the merger of their two companies.
abstract: The chief executives of the two exchange operators plan to meet in New York to discuss their next steps as European antitrust regulators continue to signal opposition to the merger of their two companies.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: NYSE and Deutsche Borse Chiefs to Discuss Plans to Save Merger
